Velocity

rdf:Description.hsterms:name: Coss, Steve
rdf:Description.hsterms:organization: Byrd Polar and Climate Research Instatute;Ohio State University

rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: A gathering place for community hydrology data to be used in constraining and validating SWOT river discharge parameter estimates . We request users submit CSVs following the template provided (SWOT_SHCQ_template.csv), and that they limit thier contributions to one such file that they update when needed.
